channel.title: Signing a JAR file
channel.description: I'm trying to run my client on my web host. I've made my client.html file for my web applet etc for my site, now before i upload my client.jar i need to sign it, I've done some research on it. but still cant fully understand on how to proceed in doing so. if someone could show me the correct methods of signing my JAR using Jarsigner and Keytools, I would really appreciate it. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 05:15:58 PM[/size][hr]still looking for help.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 06:29:37 PM[/size][hr]still seeking help...

item.title: Signing a JAR file
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Open the command window, and put in

keytool -genkeypair -alias "YourNameHere"

Then just enter all the stuff it asks.

Then do

jarsigner "NameOfClientJarFile" "YourNameHere"

and enter all the stuff it asks for.

Read full topic
